name: The Score (NotTofuFood)
description:
THE SCORE is a heist game where you have complete freedom over how you approach the heist. Things might become unstable as you go throughout your plan, be ready as anything can happen. How much will be your score?

Controls (Please Read):

WASD, Arrow Keys, or Space Bar for Movement

WASD, Arrow Keys, or Space Bar for Ladder Climbing

Scroll Wheel for Gun Selection

Press E To Use Helicopter

Click for Firing Your Gun or Helicopter Rocket

To avoid confusion, to end the heist you need to travel all the way back in the level, to the very start of it. Like keep on going all the way to the left until you can not anymore. Thanks!

A game by Aiden Thakurdial, William Grillo, and Anton Vasella.
